#summary EBookDroid is an open source (GPL'ed) document viewer for Android.

EBookDroid is an open source (GPL'ed) document viewer for Android based on the [http://code.google.com/p/vudroid VuDroid] code base.

Supported the file in following formats:
 * PDF
 * DjVu
 * XPS (OpenXPS)
 * comics books (cbz,cbr)
 * FictionBook (fb2, fb2.zip)

This software contain:
 * [http://www.mupdf.com/ MuPDF]
 * [http://djvu.sourceforge.net/ DjVuLibre]
 * [http://www.rarlab.com/ unrar]

On Google Play Market:
 * [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.ebookdroid EBookDroid]
 * [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.ebookdroid.fontpack.legacy Legacy font pack]
 * [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.ebookdroid.fontpack.nimbusl NimbusL font pack]
 * [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.ebookdroid.fontpack.freefonts FreeFonts font pack]
 * [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.ebookdroid.fontpack.urwsymbol URW Symbol font pack]

On Google Code:
 * [http://code.google.com/p/ebookdroid/downloads/list EBookDroid]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/ebookdroid-fontpacks/downloads/list EBookDroid font packs]
